content:
Just a bit of promotion, RTs are appreciated https://twitter.com/spastorino/status/1405149904410918914

As I was working on a Rust compiler issue, I took some notes and turned them into a blog post, check it out. Multiple defining uses of Type Alias Impl Traits https://santiagopastorino.com/2021/06/16/multiple-defining-uses-of-taits/ #rust #rustc

- Santiago Pastorino (@spastorino)
I think we need more posts about compiler work :heart:
then we can also incorporate these things into rustc dev guide
